title: Fit to fight
creator_credit: Gordon Stewart, Ronald H. Riley, Army Kinema Corporation and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: The physical training of the British Army, showing how it is carefully planned to help every recruit to reach his own individual peak of fitness. Explains the necessity for this high standard of physical well-being by showing how the training relates to different activities in the field.
